en.homeTitle: Create Your Online Store with Our CRM and Boost Your Sales
en.homeSubtitle: A Smart Solution for Modern Businesses
en.powerLinkTitle: Sell More & Manage Your Business Effortlessly
en.powerLinkDesc: The ultimate e-commerce and POS solution to sell online, accept payments, and manage orders seamlessly.
en.powerLinkDesc2: Set up your online store, process in-store sales, and engage with customers using smart automation. Track sales, manage inventory in real-time, and convert visitors into loyal customersâ€”all while reducing costs and boosting revenue. ğŸš€
en.strategyDesc: E-commerce is evolving fast, and our CRM is the perfect tool trusted by businesses worldwide to stay connected with customers, process orders efficiently, and enhance their shopping experience.
en.featuresDesc: Our CRM is packed with tools to simplify sales, customer management, and marketing automation. Whether you're just starting or managing a large-scale business, our platform is designed for you.
en.featuresDesc2: A powerful solution that works for you 24/7, ensuring smooth operations and increased profitability.
en.multiSocialDesc: Manage all your sales channels, including social media, website, and marketplace integrations, from a single dashboard.
en.qualityLeadsDesc: Attract and convert high-value customers with smart marketing tools and targeted engagement.
en.respondFastDesc: Enhance customer satisfaction by providing quick responses to inquiries about orders, delivery, and product details.
en.saveMoneyDesc: Reduce operational costs and boost ROI by automating workflows and optimizing resource allocation.
en.footerHeadline: Grow Your Business with Our CRM
en.footerParagraph: Manage your e-commerce operations effortlessly in one place.

features.title: Sell Online with Ease
features.description: Launch your own e-commerce store with a seamless setup, fast checkout, and mobile-friendly design.

features.title: Multi-Channel Selling
features.description: Sell on Instagram, WhatsApp, and your online store simultaneously, managing everything from one dashboard.

features.title: Automated Order Management
features.description: Track orders, send updates to customers, and manage deliveries effortlessly.

features.title: Boost Sales with Promotions
features.description: Run discounts, flash sales, and special offers to attract and retain more customers.

features.title: Smart Inventory Management
features.description: Keep track of stock levels, receive low-stock alerts, and avoid running out of best-selling products.

features.title: Automated Customer Engagement
features.description: Send personalized messages, order confirmations, and follow-ups via WhatsApp and SMS.

features.title: Seamless Payment Integration
features.description: Accept online payments securely through KNET, MyFatoorah, Hesabe, and other gateways.

features.title: Cash & Bank Balance Tracking
features.description: Monitor your shopâ€™s cash flow, online transactions, and bank balances in real time.

features.title: Manage Customer Inquiries
features.description: Handle customer questions efficiently with a built-in ticketing system and chat support.

features.title: Easy Product Management
features.description: Add, edit, and organize products quickly with images, pricing, and stock availability.

features.title: Custom Dashboard & Reports
features.description: Get real-time insights into sales, customer trends, and business performance.

features.title: Multi-User Access
features.description: Allow employees to manage different aspects of the store with role-based permissions.

features.title: Offer Buy Now, Pay Later
features.description: Increase conversions by enabling flexible payment options like installment plans.

features.title: Instant Bulk Messaging
features.description: Send promotions, updates, and special announcements to all your customers at once.

en.smartGrowthTitle: Your Success Doesnâ€™t Stop at the Beginning
en.smartGrowthDesc: Sustained growth and expansion are the keys to excellence. We provide the tools that make management easier and sales bigger.
en.businessFlexDesc: No matter your industry, we offer a comprehensive solution that helps attract customers and increase profits.
en.marketExpansionDesc: With our market expertise, we equip you with the right tools to reach new markets and outshine competitors.
en.continuousSupportTitle: Your Partner Every Step of the Way
en.continuousSupportDesc: Smart technology, precise analytics, and continuous support to help your business grow steadily. ğŸš€
